SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DDMFormInstance.formInstanceId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMFormInstance WHERE (DDMFormInstance.companyId = ?) AND (DDMFormInstance.groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(DDMFormInstance.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMFormInstance.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) )
SELECT {DDMFormInstance.*} FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT DDMFormInstance.formInstanceId FROM DDMFormInstance WHERE (DDMFormInstance.companyId = ?) AND (DDMFormInstance.groupId = ?) AND ( (lower(DDMFormInstance.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (DDMFormInstance.description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) ) TEMP_TABLE INNER JOIN DDMFormInstance ON TEMP_TABLE.formInstanceId = DDMFormInstance.formInstanceId ORDER BY DDMFormInstance.formInstanceId DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceRecordId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DDMFormInstanceRecord INNER JOIN DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion ON DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion.formInstanceRecordId = DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceRecordId WHERE (DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion.status = ?) AND (DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceId = ?)
SELECT DISTINCT {DDMFormInstanceRecord.*} FROM DDMFormInstanceRecord INNER JOIN DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion ON DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion.formInstanceRecordId = DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceRecordId WHERE (DDMFormInstanceRecordVersion.status = ?) AND (DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceId = ?) ORDER BY DDMFormInstanceRecord.formInstanceRecordId DESC
